content: swirl hat by jackie henderson video showing how to knit this hat can be found here on my youtube channel jacqknits https //youtu be/1srye8dn7oa a video showing the sequence knitting technique which is used to create this hat can be found here https //youtu be/uyued05cd48 materials size us size 5 16 circular needle yarn used worsted weight yarn loops & threads facets acrylic colors shown ember and chalk yardage approx gauge 4 x4 19 stitches and 21 row size small medium large © jacq knits abbreviations k knit p purl sts stitches round s round s k2tog knit two together decrease ssk slip slip knit decrease pattern with size us5 16 circular needle cast on 72 78 86 sts join in the round ribbing round 1 *k1 p1* repeat to end of round repeat round 1 for two inches body for small and large size only skip this set up round for the medium size hat set up row k2tog knit for remaining stitches of round 71 78 85 stitches round 1 *k4 p1 k1 p1* repeat till you have one stitch remaining in the round you will now continue to repeat that *k4 p1 k1 p1* sequence for the entire height of the hat regardless whether you reach the end of the round by continuing to repeat this 7 stitch sequence and because you have one more stitch on your needles than a multiple of 7 this pattern will shift by one stitch every round causing the swirl pattern continue this sequence repeat till your hat measures appox 8 5 9 5 10 5 inches decrease round add a stitch marker at the beginning of this round *k2tog* repeat till end of round for the small and large hat you will have one stitch remaining after your last k2tog knit this last stitch 36 39 43 stitches remaining cut thread with long tail thread remaining stitches onto darning needle removing stitches from needle as you go cinch tight to close push thread to inside of hat and weave back and forth across hole to close tightly add pompom if desired weave in ends © jacq knits
